name: The Beast & The Bookbinder
description:
The Beast’s once cursed castle has opened up its doors for the first time in hundreds of years, announcing an upcoming schedule of regular balls for all to attend and a grand opening of the gardens for visitors to come and pick certain flowers at certain hours. However, some remnants of a curse still seem to be lingering in these walls and around the castle’s owner in particular…

Although many areas of the castle are steadily being opened to visitation one by one, the entire library has remained sealed. The Beast is adamant that someone with the necessary skills and determination to maintain it must be hired before he will consider opening it to the public. There are also several books that have suffered various degrees of damage over the years… and they must certainly be fixed before the grand opening! 

Unfortunately, after the lengthy curse that fell upon the Beast’s current staff, there are not many who are willing to join their ranks. 

If you are willing to trade the chance of being cursed for employment and access to a fantastical library, the Beast would appreciate your application.
